nodes.text: The Saber's Tooth was a cantina located at the Yefowr spaceport on Taskeed. A halfway-respectable establishment, it smelt strongly of carababba tabac and intoxicants. It had a lively gambling scene, with patrons able to play sabacc, Nierer's folly, two-hand, and dootch. Celia Durasha and Kaj Nedmak met with Bwahl the Hutt in the Saber's Tooth to pick up a smuggling run to Tammuz-an.
